languages.text: "Попустительство фанатизму Скорбящего Сонма и потеря ценнейшего астропата повлекло за собой назначение нового хормейстера. В тот же день он потерял несколько важнейших сообщений, развязав тем самым войну между двумя мирами Простора Коронус. На данный момент один из них полностью уничтожен, а второй признан непригодным для жизни".

"Connivance at the Doleful Host's fanaticism and the loss of a valuable Astropath resulted in the appointment of a new Choirmaster. That same day, he lost several messages of utmost importance, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."
languages.original_text: "Попустительство фанатизму Скорбящего Сонма и потеря ценнейшего астропата повлекло за собой назначение нового хормейстера. В тот же день он потерял несколько важнейших сообщений, развязав тем самым войну между двумя мирами Простора Коронус. На данный момент один из них полностью уничтожен, а второй признан непригодным для жизни".

That same day, he lost several messages of utmost importance, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

languages.text: "Die Duldung des Fanatismus des Traurigen Gastgebers und der Verlust eines wertvollen Astropathen führte zur Ernennung eines neuen Chormeisters. Dieser verlor am selben Tag mehrere Nachrichten von höchster Wichtigkeit, was einen Krieg zwischen zwei Welten der Koronus-Ausdehnung auslöste. Zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt ist eine dieser Welten komplett zerstört und die andere unbewohnbar geworden."
languages.original_text: "Connivance at the Doleful Host's fanaticism and the loss of a valuable Astropath resulted in the appointment of a new Choirmaster. That same day, he lost several messages of utmost importance, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: "Die Duldung des Fanatismus des Traurigen Gastgebers und der Verlust eines wertvollen Astropathen führte zur Ernennung eines neuen Chormeisters. Dieser verlor am selben Tag mehrere Nachrichten von höchster Wichtigkeit, was einen Krieg zwischen zwei Welten der Koronus-Ausdehnung auslöste. Zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt ist eine dieser Welten komplett zerstört und die andere unbewohnbar geworden."

languages.text: « La connivence avec le fanatisme du Concile des Affligés et la perte d'un éminent astropathe a mené à la nomination d'un nouveau maître de chœur. Le même jour, il a perdu plusieurs messages de la plus haute importance, déclenchant une guerre entre deux mondes des Étendues de Koronus. L'un de ces mondes a été complètement détruit, et l'autre est considéré comme inhabitable. »
languages.original_text: "Connivance at the Doleful Host's fanaticism and the loss of a valuable Astropath resulted in the appointment of a new Choirmaster. That same day, he lost several messages of utmost importance, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: « La connivence avec le fanatisme du Concile des Affligés et la perte d'un éminent astropathe a mené à la nomination d'un nouveau maître de chœur. Le même jour, il a perdu plusieurs messages de la plus haute importance, déclenchant une guerre entre deux mondes des Étendues de Koronus. L'un de ces mondes a été complètement détruit, et l'autre est considéré comme inhabitable. »

languages.text: “行商浪人纵容阴沉之主的狂热暴行，导致达戈努斯损失了一位宝贵的唱诗大师，星语唱诗班不得不临时任命新任唱诗大师。就在同一天，这位新任唱诗大师遗失了几条至关重要的信息，导致科罗努斯扩区的两个世界爆发了战争。目前，其中一个世界已经被彻底摧毁，而另一个世界已经不再适合居住。”
languages.original_text: "Connivance at the Doleful Host's fanaticism and the loss of a valuable Astropath resulted in the appointment of a new Choirmaster. That same day, he lost several messages of utmost importance, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人纵容阴沉之主的狂热暴行，导致达戈努斯损失了一位宝贵的唱诗大师，星语唱诗班不得不临时任命新任唱诗大师。就在同一天，这位新任唱诗大师遗失了几条至关重要的信息，导致科罗努斯扩区的两个世界爆发了战争。目前，其中一个世界已经被彻底摧毁，而另一个世界已经不再适合居住。”

languages.text: «La complicidad con el fanatismo de la Hueste Dolosa y la pérdida de un valioso Astrópata tuvo como resultado el nombramiento de un nuevo maestro del Coro. Ese mismo día, perdió varios mensajes de extrema importancia, lo que provocó una guerra entre dos mundos de la Extensión de Koronus. A día de hoy, uno de esos mundos está destruido por completo, mientras que el otro se ha declarado inhabitable».
languages.original_text: "Connivance at the Doleful Host's fanaticism and the loss of a valuable Astropath resulted in the appointment of a new Choirmaster. That same day, he lost several messages of utmost importance, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: «La complicidad con el fanatismo de la Hueste Dolosa y la pérdida de un valioso Astrópata tuvo como resultado el nombramiento de un nuevo maestro del Coro. Ese mismo día, perdió varios mensajes de extrema importancia, lo que provocó una guerra entre dos mundos de la Extensión de Koronus. A día de hoy, uno de esos mundos está destruido por completo, mientras que el otro se ha declarado inhabitable».

languages.text: 「ドールフル・ホストの狂信への共謀と貴重な感応通信官の損失により、新たなクワイアーマスターが任命されました。同じ日に、彼は極めて重要な複数のメッセージを紛失し、その結果、コロヌス・エクスパンスの二つの惑星の間で戦争が勃発しました。現在、惑星の一つは完全に破壊され、もう一方は居住不能とされています」
languages.original_text: "Connivance at the Doleful Host's fanaticism and the loss of a valuable Astropath resulted in the appointment of a new Choirmaster. That same day, he lost several messages of utmost importance, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: 「ドールフル・ホストの狂信への共謀と貴重な感応通信官の損失により、新たなクワイアーマスターが任命されました。同じ日に、彼は極めて重要な複数のメッセージを紛失し、その結果、コロヌス・エクスパンスの二つの惑星の間で戦争が勃発しました。現在、惑星の一つは完全に破壊され、もう一方は居住不能とされています」

languages.text: "Konakçı'nın fanatizmine göz yumulması ve değerli bir Astropat'ın kaybı, yeni bir Koro Şefi atanmasıyla sonuçlandı. O gün yeni şef, son derece mühim mesajları kaybederek iki Enginlik dünyası arasında bir savaşın fitilini ateşledi. Biri yok oldu, diğeri ise harap hâlde."
languages.original_text: "Connivance at the Doleful Host's fanaticism and the loss of a valuable Astropath resulted in the appointment of a new Choirmaster. That same day, he lost several messages of utmost importance, thus sparking a war between two Koronus Expanse worlds. As of now, one of those worlds has been completely destroyed, and the other deemed uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: "Konakçı'nın fanatizmine göz yumulması ve değerli bir Astropat'ın kaybı, yeni bir Koro Şefi atanmasıyla sonuçlandı. O gün, yeni şef son derece mühim mesajları kaybederek iki Enginlik dünyası arasında bir savaşın fitilini ateşledi. Biri yok oldu, diğeri ise harap hâlde."
